languages.text: "Не слушай. Отринь. Не позволяй затуманить свой разум, элантах. Никто не способен получить все и дать все — даже ингир, пожиратель звезд. А этот осколок ингира... не в силах даровать свободу даже себе".

"Do not listen. Reject the promises. Do not allow your mind to be clouded, elantach. No one is capable of receiving everything — or granting everything. Not even a star-devouring Yngir. And this shard of an Yngir... cannot even grant itself freedom."
languages.original_text: "Не слушай. Отринь. Не позволяй затуманить свой разум, элантах. Никто не способен получить все и дать все — даже ингир, пожиратель звезд. А этот осколок ингира... не в силах даровать свободу даже себе".

traits.locale_text: "Do not listen. Shun it. Don't allow your mind to be clouded, elantach. No one is capable of getting everything or giving everything. Not even a star-devouring Yngir. And this shard of an Yngir... cannot even free itself."

"Do not listen. Shun it. Don't allow your mind to be clouded, elantach. No one is capable of getting everything or giving everything. Not even a star-devouring Yngir. And this shard of an Yngir... cannot even free itself."

"Do not listen. Shun it. Don't allow your mind to be clouded, elantach. No one is capable of receiving everything or giving everything. Not even a star-devouring Yngir. And this shard of an Yngir... cannot even free itself."

"Do not listen. Shun it. Don't allow your mind to be clouded, elantach. No one is capable of receiving everything or giving everything. Not even a star-devouring Yngir. And this shard of an Yngir... cannot even free itself."

"Do not listen. Reject the promises. Do not allow your mind to be clouded, elantach. No one is capable of receiving everything — or granting everything. Not even a star-devouring Yngir. And this shard of an Yngir... cannot even grant itself freedom."

"Do not listen. Reject the promises. Do not allow your mind to be clouded, elantach. No one is capable of receiving everything — or granting everything. Not even a star-devouring Yngir. And this shard of an Yngir... cannot even grant itself freedom."

languages.text: «No le escuches. Rechaza sus promesas. No dejes que nuble tu mente, elantach. Nadie puede recibirlo todo ni darlo todo. Ni siquiera un Yngir devorador de estrellas. Y este fragmento de un Yngir... ni siquiera puede otorgarse a sí mismo la libertad».
languages.original_text: "Do not listen. Reject the promises. Do not allow your mind to be clouded, elantach. No one is capable of receiving everything — or granting everything. Not even a star-devouring Yngir. And this shard of an Yngir... cannot even grant itself freedom."

traits.locale_text: «No le escuches. Recházalo. No dejes que nuble tu mente, elantach. Nadie puede recibirlo todo ni darlo todo. Ni siquiera un Yngir devorador de estrellas. Y este fragmento de un Yngir... ni siquiera puede liberarse a sí mismo».

languages.text: « N'écoutez pas. Rejetez ces promesses. Votre esprit ne doit pas être obscurci, elantach. Personne ne peut tout recevoir ni tout donner, pas même un Yngir dévoreur d'étoiles. Et ce fragment d'Yngir... n'est même pas capable de se libérer. »
languages.original_text: "Do not listen. Reject the promises. Do not allow your mind to be clouded, elantach. No one is capable of receiving everything — or granting everything. Not even a star-devouring Yngir. And this shard of an Yngir... cannot even grant itself freedom."

traits.locale_text: « N'écoutez pas. Rejetez cette pensée. Votre esprit ne doit pas être obscurci, elantach. Personne ne peut tout recevoir ni tout donner, pas même un Yngir dévoreur d'étoiles. Et ce fragment d'Yngir... n'est même pas capable de se libérer. »

languages.text: 「耳を貸してはいけない。約束を拒否するんだ。心を曇らされるな、エランタ。すべてを手に入れられる者も、すべてを与えられる者も存在しない。星を貪るインギルでさえもできはしない。そしてこのインギルの破片は…自らを解き放つこともできない」
languages.original_text: "Do not listen. Reject the promises. Do not allow your mind to be clouded, elantach. No one is capable of receiving everything — or granting everything. Not even a star-devouring Yngir. And this shard of an Yngir... cannot even grant itself freedom."

traits.locale_text: 「耳を貸してはいけない。約束を拒否するんだ。心を曇らされるな、エランタ。すべてを手に入れられる者も、すべてを与えられる者も存在しない。星を貪るインギルでさえもできはしない。そしてこのインギルの破片は…自らを解き放つこともできない」

languages.text: "Hört nicht hin. Lehnt die Versprechungen ab. Lasst nicht zu, dass Euer Verstand getrübt wird, Elantach. Niemand ist in der Lage, alles zu empfangen oder alles zu gewähren. Nicht einmal ein sternefressender Yngir. Und dieses Fragment eines Yngirs ... kann sich nicht einmal selbst Freiheit gewähren."
languages.original_text: "Do not listen. Reject the promises. Do not allow your mind to be clouded, elantach. No one is capable of receiving everything — or granting everything. Not even a star-devouring Yngir. And this shard of an Yngir... cannot even grant itself freedom."

traits.locale_text: "Hört nicht hin. Ignoriert es. Lasst nicht zu, dass Euer Verstand getrübt wird, Elantach. Niemand ist in der Lage, alles zu empfangen oder alles zu geben. Nicht einmal ein sternefressender Yngir. Und dieses Fragment eines Yngirs ... kann sich nicht einmal befreien."

languages.text: “别听它的，不要被它蒙蔽了双眼，外界人。没有任何东西可以接受一切、赐予一切，就算是噬星者的碎片也做不到这一点。而且，这块噬星者的碎片……甚至没有能力重获自由。”
languages.original_text: "Do not listen. Reject the promises. Do not allow your mind to be clouded, elantach. No one is capable of receiving everything — or granting everything. Not even a star-devouring Yngir. And this shard of an Yngir... cannot even grant itself freedom."

traits.locale_text: “别听它的，不要被它蒙蔽了双眼，外界人。没有任何东西可以接受一切、赐予一切，就算是噬星者的碎片也做不到这一点。而且，这块噬星者的碎片……甚至没有能力重获自由。”

languages.text: "Onu dinleme. Vaatlerini reddet. Zihnini bulandırmasına izin verme elantach. Hiç kimsenin her şeye sahip olmaya veya her şeyi bahşetmeye gücü yoktur. Yıldız yutan bir Yngir'in bile. Bu Yngir parçası, kendini özgür bırakamıyor bile."
languages.original_text: "Do not listen. Reject the promises. Do not allow your mind to be clouded, elantach. No one is capable of receiving everything — or granting everything. Not even a star-devouring Yngir. And this shard of an Yngir... cannot even grant itself freedom."
